modernize-avoid-variadic-functions.description:
Description

Find all function definitions (but not declarations) of C-style variadic
functions.

Instead of C-style variadic functions, C++ function parameter pack should be
used.

References
This check corresponds to the CERT C++ Coding Standard rule
DCL50-CPP. Do not define a C-style variadic function
.
modernize-avoid-variadic-functions.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
